title: PPC Strategist / Media Buyer (Remote)
job_overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled and dynamic PPC Strategist / Media Buyer Consultant to join our fast-paced digital marketing agency. This client-facing role serves as the face of our agency and is crucial to ensuring our clients’ success. The ideal candidate will bring a deep understanding of digital media buying, outstanding project management capabilities, and the expertise needed to drive exceptional results across multiple accounts.
This position focuses on managing client relationships, leading the execution of digital media buying campaigns, and ensuring projects are consistently delivered on time, within budget, and aligned with client objectives. The ideal candidate will have advanced skills in PPC strategy, campaign optimization, and team coordination and be adept at working in a high-pressure, collaborative agency environment.

Key Responsibilities

Client Account Management
Act as the primary point of contact and trusted advisor for clients, consistently delivering value and fostering strong relationships.

Understand client goals, translate them into actionable strategies, and ensure all needs are anticipated and met.

Set clear expectations, provide regular updates, and address client concerns swiftly and professionally.

Champion client success by consistently analyzing campaign performance and identifying opportunities for optimization.

Digital Media Buying & Campaign Strategy
Oversee and execute digital media buying campaigns across diverse platforms, including but not limited to:

Social Media Platforms: Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, and Twitter.
Google Advertising Platforms: Google Ads, YouTube Ads, Google Display Network, and Google Shopping.
Third-Party Media Buying Platforms: Amazon Ads, Taboola, Outbrain, and The Trade Desk.
Design and implement PPC strategies aimed at achieving client KPIs such as ROI, CPA, ROAS, and CTR.
Perform keyword research, audience targeting, bid adjustments, and creative testing to improve campaign results.
Stay informed about platform updates, emerging trends, and cutting-edge technologies to maintain a competitive advantage.

Project Management & Process Oversight
Manage the full spectrum of campaign execution, from planning and timeline development to post-implementation reporting and analysis.
Develop and maintain project timelines to ensure agency teams meet deadlines without compromising quality.
Proactively coordinate internal teams (such as creative, data, and media buying teams) to deliver seamless, integrated marketing solutions.
Monitor project scope and budgets, identifying risks and resolving potential issues before they impact deliverables.
Use project management tools to streamline workflows and optimize operational efficiency.

Required Skills and Qualifications

Digital Marketing Expertise

Proven expertise in PPC strategy and campaign execution across a wide array of platforms, including social media, Google, and leading third-party media buying tools.

Advanced analytical skills with the ability to derive data-backed insights and adapt campaigns accordingly.

Comprehensive understanding of A/B testing, conversion rate optimization, and audience segmentation best practices.

Familiarity with attribution models, cross-channel marketing strategies, and performance tracking.

Account Management & Client Relationship Skills

Exceptional communication skills to convey complex concepts in a clear, concise, and compelling way.

Experience aligning client priorities with agency capabilities to set realistic expectations while delivering remarkable results.

Strong conflict resolution abilities and a proactive approach to problem-solving.

Project Management Expertise
Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced agency environment.
Skilled in creating and managing timelines, budgets, and workflows.
Familiarity with project management tools such as Asana, Trello, or similar platforms.

Key Professional Abilities
Master multitasking across various clients, all while maintaining high attention to detail and delivering exceptional results.
Adaptive mindset to manage competing priorities and deliver under tight deadlines.
Strong leadership and team collaboration skills to align cross-functional teams with project goals.

Preferred Qualifications

5+ years of experience in an agency role as an Account Manager, PPC Strategist, or similar roles.

Certifications in Google Ads, Facebook Blueprint, or similar platforms.

Knowledge of advanced data visualization tools such as Google Data Studio, Tableau, or Power BI.

Experience with custom CRM/reporting integrations to track campaign performance effectively.

Employment Information
Type: 15 - 30 hours/Week - Contract
Location: Remote 
Compensation: Competitive and based on experience
Availability: Monday - Friday Eastern Standard Time (NY Time Zone)

This is an unparalleled opportunity to work in a forward-thinking digital marketing agency that values innovation, collaboration, and data-driven success. If you’re passionate about building client relationships, driving impactful digital campaigns, and leading cross-functional teams, we’d love to hear from you.
